description:
Shunrei applies the Water of Life to Shiryu’s eye, but there’s still no sign of Shiryu’s sight returning. One day, a Gold Saint ‘Cancer’ named Deathmask visits the Goroho to get rid of the Rooshi. Knowing that he’s no match for him, Shiryu challenges Deathmask in order to save the Rooshi.
Source: crunchyroll
